color: yellow, red, purple, black, white, pink, green, blue, light blue
material: neoprene coating, cast iron core, plastic rack
usage: Gym exercises including bicep curls, tricep extensions, lunges, squats, cardio, shoulder press

Reduces noise and impact when dropped
ai_description: A set of three pairs of brightly colored dumbbells (yellow 1kg, red 1.5kg, purple 2kg) displayed on a black A-frame plastic rack. Each dumbbell has the KAKSS brand and weight clearly printed in white. The dumbbells feature a hexagonal shape with flat bottoms and ergonomic handles. Lifestyle images show people using various colored dumbbells (red, black, purple, pink, green, blue) in home and gym settings. Product features are highlighted with graphic icons emphasizing non-toxic, smell-proof, and washable properties.
target_audience: Home gym users and commercial gyms
product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells sets for Gym Exercise
manual: Manufactured using REACH-compliant, non-toxic materials, these dumbbells feature an odor-free, color-stable coating that resists fading and wear over time. The carbon-free composition ensures a cleaner, safer finish, while the surface texture remains consistent and comfortable even under extreme hot or cold temperature conditions. Designed with a precision hex shape, the dumbbells offer enhanced ground stability and prevent rolling during floor-based exercises, making them safe, durable, and reliable for everyday training.
